transcript:
Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan ji Rajpur ji aapne mujhe matlab kal parso ha parso hi aapne call kiya tha sir to bataye sir koi problem face kar rahe the sir.

Customer: Na koi problem to face nahi tha aise kuch hum customer ko call kar rahe the us time.

Executive: Customer ko call kar rahe the matlab.

Customer: Wo matlab jo by lead hota hai na.

Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir. Hum by lead se hum call kar rahe the customer se koi order tha to hum receive karne ke liye call kar rahe the.

Customer: [inaudible] aapke pass aap logo ka kya to chala gaya.

Executive: Wo actually sir kal aap us din aapka morning mein bhi call aaya aur fir dopahar mein bhi 3 baje ke aas pass aaya to maine kaha sir koi matlab problem vagaira to nahi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Mera number se call mera number se call gaya.

Executive: Main ek bar aapko check karke bata raha hun ye call mere pass aaya sir ye jo last mein 719 se end hota hai na aapka jo secondary number hai.

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Haan unki taraf se aaya tha ye call mere pass to wo wo matlab kaun hai sir.

Customer: Last kya tha last mein.

Executive: 719 sir.

Customer: Seven seven 719 matlab 81 se start hua tha wo number aur 719 pe end hua tha.

Customer: Achcha 71 719 719.

Executive: Haan ji ye aapka secondary number hai na sir.

Customer: Haan ye ye mera office ka bhi ek number hai.

Executive: Achcha to matlab wahi sir main janna chah raha hun ki koi dikkat vagaira to nahi aa rahi hai na sir.

Customer: Wo sir ye ha ye ho sakta hai sir koi matlab office se koi call kar diya aise lag raha hai mistake se ho gaya.

Executive: Achcha mistake se hi hua hai na sir.

Customer: Haan haan haan haan.

Executive: Achcha aur baki sir mujhe ek do factors bata dijiye matlab jaise abhi aapse mera bahut pehle discussion hua tha to aapne kaha tha ki aap ek dedicated team member assign kar rahe ho India mart ko handle karne ke liye.

Customer: To wo kiya aapne.

Executive: Team karne ke liye ha wo kiya tha lekin uske baad bhi thoda team ko problem ho raha hai main to khud hi kar raha hun abhi team hiring karne ke liye abhi bhi chal raha hai kam chal raha hai hiring karne ke liye problem hota hai na sir team hiring karne ke liye.

Executive: Wo ho jayega to aur bhi ha lekin sir jaise aapke pass ha ji jaise customers ke call vagaira aaya kare to sir wo aap matlab actually thoda receive kar liya karo.

Customer: Hai na.

Executive: Receive karta hun sir mera to char panch project hai sir bahut dikkat hota hai aur India mart ke jo kam karega na to matlab achche employee hona chahiye baat karne matlab baat karke deal karna hota hai na.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Isliye thoda aate hai koi matlab kam karne ke liye interview de dete lekin achche nahi lagte jo kam kar sakte hai isliye employee dene ke liye problem ho raha hai to lag raha hai isi month mein hum employee de denge 15.

Executive: Achcha aur baki aap ye bataye matlab abhi jaise ye jo by list vagaira consume kar rahe hain aap hi kar rahe hain ya fir koi aur kar raha hai.

Customer: Haan main main main main khud hi kar raha hun jab mera jab jaise time milta hai na main khud karti hun.

Executive: Haan ji matlab aap abhi khud hi handle kar rahe ho ye sari cheeze hai na sir.

Customer: Haan haan sir haan.

Executive: To abhi sir bas aap ek bas aapka jyada samay nahi lunga aur bas aapko ek chhoti si taklif jarur dunga sir abhi aap ek bar bas apne phone mein India mart ka app open karke ek koi by lead consume kar lijiye sir.

Customer: Haan kar raha hun abhi kar raha hun abhi aap ek second line par hi reh ke please sir ye chhoti si cheez kar lijiye actually kya hota hai na sir jaise aapne call kiya us din ha us din main thoda leave pe tha to leave pe rehne ke chakkar mein wo call main pick nahi kar paya galti se to uska yahan pe humko aata hai ki service bahut achcha hai isliye to aap se bilkul mera number save karke rakhiye aur baki agar man lo jaise is vajah se liye galti se lag gaya call baki agar kabhi aisa ho bhi to in future ki main call na utha paun to aap mujhe whatsapp pe reach out kar liya karo whatsapp pe aap mujhe call aapka number aapka number mujhe save kar liya na sir wo number aapko call matlab us number se call karungi bhi problem honge.

Executive: 00 aapke last mein 009 hai na sir aaj maine aapko text bhi diye the sir kafi sare message bhi kiye the to ha aap ek bar ye main aapko ek bar fir se message bhej de raha hun aap ye number save kar lo mera man lo sir kabhi at instance agar main call pick nahi kar pa raha hun to aap mujhe whatsapp par reach out kar liya karo whatsapp par text kar diya karo main aapse turant ke turant coordinate kar lunga actually hota hai sir kabhi kbar calls pe hum thoda sa nahi active reh pate hain.

Customer: Baki ek bar sir aap mujhe.

Executive: Ha aap SMS kar do to usse kya rehta hai SMS se turant phone to sir agar man lo us samay nahi utha paya baki SMS to dekhi jate hain sir hai na to aap sir ek bar bas by lead vagaira sir aapne wo consume kar li.

Customer: Haan kar rahe hai sir abhi abhi hum baat kar rahe hai aapse main khud hi by lead ke andar hun.

Executive: Haan bas line pe ek bar karke by lead sir consume kar lijiye jisse ki main yahan pe sab mention kar dun baki sir sach mein koi dikkat aa to nahi rahi hai na sir.

Customer: Na na sir koi problem nahi hai sab abhi din karne ke liye mere pass wo jo thoda problem bhi hai employee hire karne ke liye sir sahi baat yahi hai jo office ka office ka kam chal raha hai na sir uske baad decoration ka kam chal raha hai.

Executive: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Abhi khatam nahi hua hai sir.

Executive: Aap ek bar kal phone free ho na main aapko dikhaunga video call karke jiska kam chal raha hai abhi khatam nahi hua hai.

Executive: Haan to aap batao sir kab free hai ki hum log ek bar ek video call kar le aur bhi cheeze aapko chhoti moti guide kar dun.

Customer: Ab aap aap kal 1 baje tak call kijiyega main us project ke side pe rahungi.

Executive: Achcha kab karun sir.

Customer: Kal kal 1 baje tak ek nahi aap 12:30 tak kijiye.

Executive: Haan 12:30 baje kal hum milenge ek discussion kar lenge theek hai sir.

Customer: Please discussion.

Executive: Okay sir thank you.

Customer: Okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call from office number.

- Difficulty hiring employees for IndiaMART work.

- Wants executive to receive calls.

- Wants guidance on using IndiaMART effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the call was a mistake.

- Executive will connect via video call.

- Executive shared WhatsApp number for easy contact.

- Executive requested customer to consume a buylead.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer at 12:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, hiring, support, follow up, app
